attributes.action: Take all gas and electricity production and supply into public ownership.
attributes.additional_details: We can’t afford to heat our homes! People with terminal cancer ( with cancer in their bones ) and who already have sore bones are living the remainder of their lives scared to put the heating on. The cold makes their bones more sore! The elderly, the disabled, children EVERYONE, apart from millionaires and billionaires ARE ALL SUFFERING!
attributes.background: Take all gas and electricity production and supply into public ownership. That way, the insane profits can go into the public purse and the government will be able to lower taxes!
